entities.name: dad
entities.description: The father of George and his family. He is described as being soft with the kids and thinks they are funny.

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of Mr Weasley's children. He is excited to see his dad come home.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: The father of George and his family. He is described as being a thin man with red hair going bald.

relationships.description: George is excited to see his dad come home, as indicated by his exclamation 'Dad's home!'
Mr Weasley is the parent of George, as indicated by the context that George is one of Mr Weasley's children.
